text: qal lahum sheyb- waqad kanuu yunqiswn alkayl walmyzan-: atmmu alkayl lilnaas wafyana lhm, wala takunuu mmn yunqiswn alnaas hqwqhm, wazinu bialmizan aleadl almstqym, wala tanqusuu alnaas shyyana min huquqihim fi kayl 'aw wazn 'aw ghyr dhlk, wala tkthru fi al'ard alfsad, balshrk walqatl walnhb wtkhwyf alnaas wartkab almeasy
